row.process: :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "SQL User" :SET &UC4RB_DB_USERNAME# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_DB_USERNAME#) :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_USERNAME# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "SQL Password" :SET &UC4RB_DB_PASSWORD# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_DB_PASSWORD#) :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_PASSWORD# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "JDBC Connection String" :SET &UC4RB_DB_JDBC_CONN# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_DB_JDBC_CONN#) :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_JDBC_CONN# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "JDBC Driver JAR URI" :SET &UC4RB_DB_DRIVER_JAR# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_DB_DRIVER_JAR#) :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_DRIVER_JAR# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "JDBC Driver Class" :SET &UC4RB_DB_DRIVER_CLASS# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_DB_DRIVER_CLASS#) :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_DRIVER_CLASS# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Connection Interval" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_CONN_INTRVL# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Number of Connection Retries" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_CONN_RETRY# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Database to Create" :SET &UC4RB_DB_CREATE_DB_NAME# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_DB_CREATE_DB_NAME#) :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_CREATE_DB_NAME# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Filespec" :SET &UC4RB_DB_FILE_SPEC# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_DB_FILE_SPEC#) :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_FILE_SPEC# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Filegroupspec" :SET &UC4RB_DB_FILEGROUP_SPEC# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_DB_FILEGROUP_SPEC#) :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_FILEGROUP_SPEC# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Log" :SET &UC4RB_DB_LOG_ON_FILE_SPEC# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_DB_LOG_ON_FILE_SPEC#) :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_LOG_ON_FILE_SPEC# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Fail if DB exists" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_FAIL_IF_DB_EXISTS# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Thrustworthy" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_TRUSTWORTHY_ON# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "DB chaining" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_DBCHAINING_ON# echo "********************************" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Overwrite Login" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &LOGIN# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Overwrite Agent" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &AGENT# echo "********************************"
